item.title: Modern Classics of Cinema | Super 8
item.author: Hafiz Zainal,
item.description: J. J. Abrams’ sci-fi adventure Super 8 is a poetic tribute to early Spielberg films, taking us down the avenue of their childhood memories: shooting action films with neighbourhood friends on an 8mm format camera – known as the Super 8, it was first marketed in the 60’s as a user-friendly …

item.title: Lights Out Leaves Us in the Dark
item.author: Hafiz Zainal,
item.description: David Sandberg pops his cherry in the world of big budget films with Lights Out, a horror flick based on his YouTube short of the same name. James Wan, director of The Conjuring series, takes the ambitious Swedish-born director under his wing as producer. But just how much Wan coached his new …
